title: conferred on me by section 16(4) of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Section 16(1))
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Section 16(1)) 

(Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance act 2022 (section 16(1)) (commencement) order 2023

title: conferred on me by section 16(4) of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022),
heading: 2. The 20th day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which
text_raw:
2. The 20th day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which 
section 16(1) of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

14 November, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 17th November, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [555] 3
